author: Flick Connection
description:

________________________________________

I'm your host, Darren Van Dam!

Every year, January ends up being one of the best months to be a Netflix subscriber. They flip their entire catalog purging old movies and adding new ones with the first day of the year bringing the most changes. Here we're talking about the best throwback movies coming to Netflix on January 1st then we cover all the new releases coming to Netflix in January 2026. This month, Ben Affleck and Matt Damon team up in a dirty cop action flick directed by Joe Cranahan, Bone Lake hits Netflix mid month, Alex Honnold will climb one of the world's tallest buildings Live, and Bridgerton retruns for Season 4.

Stay tuned to Flick Connection for lists of the best movies on Netflix and other streaming services each week!
